effect.name: Palette Swapper
effect.description: Used to swap the palette of an object, be it an active or a background.
effect.author: Warguy555, DX11 Port by NaitorStudios

parameter.name: PaletteTexture
parameter.description: Image containing all palettes stacked on top of one another or a singular palette.

parameter.name: PaletteIndex
parameter.description: The y location or row of the desired palette (as a whole number in pixels).

parameter.name: PaletteHeight
parameter.description: The height of the palette texture (as a whole number in pixels).
